name: The Harvester (01F0)
description:
⚠️Trigger warnings ⚠️

The following warnings are mostly from in-game content in text form.

The visual side of the game is not very graphic, except a couple of very stylized photos of a man eating an organ and lying dead on the ground.

TW and CW: self-injurious behavior, abuse, suicide, child death, mental illness, kidnapping, swearing, sex, organ eating, blood, death

If we missed any warnings, please tell us in the comments and we'll add it ASAP.
